US strong alcoholic drink: He spent most of his money on liquor and drugs. Count a drink as 12 ounces of regular beer, 5 ounces of wine or one shot of liquor or spirits.
the liquid in which food is cooked or steeped (= kept in to improve its flavour): Take the mixture off the heat once it has concentrated to a thin but aromatic liquor. Lift the pears out of the liquor into a serving bowl.
